name: Fi-ware-security-sap.github.io
tagline: The Security research contributions developed by SAP team in FI-WARE
body:
# Welcome to the FI-WARE Security research prototypes developed by SAP.

This space contains two software developed under the umbrella of the [FI-WARE project](http://www.fi-ware.org), supported by the European Commission. The FI-WARE project, in a nutshell, "aims to provide a framework for development of smart applications in the Future Internet", please see [the FI-WARE Vision page](http://www.fi-ware.org/our-vision/) for more details and an explanation of main concepts.

## Software
The project hosted on this space are:
* [PPL](http://fi-ware-security-sap.github.io/fiware-ppl), an access/usage control service for the cloud.
* [DBA](http://fi-ware-security-sap.github.io/fiware-dba), a service to evaluate anonymization policies and anonymize datasets.

## Contacts
* [Slim Trabelsi](mailto:slim.trabelsi == add the 'at' == sap.com)
* [Francesco Di Cerbo] (https://github.com/fdicerbo)
